workflows.title: metabolise
workflows.description: Generate metabolism transformations. Identifies key metabolic intermediates across multiple species and generates metabolic pathways and enzyme interactions.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical are you interested in?

workflows.title: pathways
workflows.description: Predict interactions with chemical pathways. Maps how chemicals interact with biological pathways and systems. Analyzes potential disruptions and effects on cellular processes to identify mechanisms of toxicity.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical and pathway are you interested in?

workflows.title: orchestrate
workflows.description: Combines insights from prediction, metabolism and pathway analysis to provide a comprehensive toxicological assessment of chemical compounds.
workflows.initial_prompt: what chemical are you interested in?
